session_history.summary: Initial project setup with VISTA documentation system. Created core directory structure and base documentation templates. Established session continuity protocol and context recovery mechanisms.

Completed all persona configurations for all three panel types: Evaluation Chamber (13 personas), Pathfinder Council (9 personas), and Legal Panel (7 personas). Created panel-specific prompt templates, updated implementation plan, set up git repository, and added license files.

Enhanced legal documentation by creating the LEGAL_GATOR_LIMITS.md document which clearly defines what legal gator personas can and cannot do reliably. Updated the legal prompt template to include mandatory disclaimers and limitations awareness.
